inclusion.criterion: morphologic diagnosis of acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: evidence of ALL involvement in bone marrow and/or blood
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Philadelphia (Ph) positive and/or BCR/ABL positive as confirmed by standard cytogenetics, fluorescent in situ hybridization (FISH), and/or polymerase chain reaction (PCR) testing performed by local laboratory
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: bilirubin =< 3.0 x institutional upper limit of normal (IULN)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: serum glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase (SGOT) (aspartate aminotransferase [AST]) =< 3.0 x IULN and/or serum glutamate pyruvate transaminase
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients may have received no more than one course of remission induction therapy for ALL
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients with M0 acute myeloid leukemia (AML) or mixed lineage leukemia are not eligible for this study
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: patients with L3 (Burkitts) are also not eligible
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has systemic mastocytosis, but does not meet criteria for ALL or Philadelphia chromosome positivity.
